circumstances: The crew was engaged in a choice of landing sites on drifting ice in the Kara Sea. Upon landing on ice, the right ski struck a blow of snow. Both skis were torn off while the fuselage and both lower wings received significant damages. All five occupants were rescued while the aircraft was abandoned on site and later sank  during ice hummock.
probable_cause: The aircraft was slightly of course upon landing compare to the first landing aircraft.
